title: datalad diff -r submod  doesn't show any changes
body:
```shell
(git)smaug:/mnt/btrfs/datasets/datalad/crawl/crcns[master]git
$> datalad diff -r pvc-1
$> datalad diff -d . -r pvc-1   
```
I guess because it looks only within the submodule and not "relative" to the state in the current dataset (even despite `-d .`), although changes are there;
```shell
$> git diff pvc-1

index b470188..4d3693f 160000
--- a/pvc-1
+++ b/pvc-1
@@ -1 +1 @@
-Subproject commit b470188ba27a424898f4ab0d06848bace694704c
+Subproject commit 4d3693f54465f00664c99962f0917958e03985ea
(dev) 2 15536.....................................:Sat 24 Nov 2018 08:57:24 AM EST:.
(git)smaug:/mnt/btrfs/datasets/datalad/crawl/crcns[master]git
$> git -C pvc-1 diff b470188ba27a424898f4ab0d06848bace694704c..4d3693f54465f00664c99962f0917958e03985ea
```
